attributes.action: Deselect MPs standing for election who didn't follow constituents wish in Brexit
attributes.additional_details: E.g. Derby City voted 57% to leave the EU, both MP's are remain supporters and haven't represented the instruction given by the voters
attributes.background: MPs are voted into Parliment to represent their constituencey. Failing to represent them and ignoring their instruction to remain or leave is gross misconduct.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because this isn't something the UK Government or Parliament is responsible for. This would be the responsibility of the political parties.
